mapper.insert: insert into company_info (company_id, company_status, custom_id, company_name, company_type, tax, address, free_delivery, include_cancel, begin_date, end_date, boss_name, boss_id, boss_contact, boss_id_pic_up, boss_id_pic_back, cfo_name, cfo_id, cfo_contact, cfo_id_pic_up, cfo_id_pic_back ) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{includeCancel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossIdPicUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bossIdPicBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfoContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfoIdPicUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfoIdPicBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select company_id, company_status, custom_id, company_name, company_type, tax, address, free_delivery, include_cancel, begin_date, end_date, boss_name, boss_id, boss_contact, boss_id_pic_up, boss_id_pic_back, cfo_name, cfo_id, cfo_contact, cfo_id_pic_up, cfo_id_pic_back from company_info where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
